mapper.insert: INSERT INTO game_record(user_id, score, level, play_time) VALUES(#{userId}, #{score}, #{level}, #{playTime})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM game_record WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT gr.*, u.username FROM game_record gr LEFT JOIN user u ON gr.user_id = u.id ORDER BY gr.score DESC, gr.record_date ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
